function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in response to building evidence of crisis onset","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher rates of infection","Mitigation":"Early detection systems and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies and predictive analytics","People":"Marginalized populations and communities with limited access to healthcare","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Nationalism at the expense of the global good","Impact":"Limited cooperation in disease response and unequal distribution of resources","Mitigation":"International collaboration and resource sharing agreements","Technologies":"Global health data systems and resource allocation algorithms","People":"Global population and developing countries","Owner":"International health organizations and global governance bodies"},{"Description":"Conspiracy theories and fatigue of mitigation measures","Impact":"Undermining of public health efforts and decreased compliance with preventive measures","Mitigation":"Public health education and targeted communication strategies","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools and misinformation detection algorithms","People":"General population and communities at risk","Owner":"Public health institutions and communication professionals"}]}
